name: Humanlike
headline: AI-powered AP/AR
description: A better alternative to outsourcing accounts payable and receivable. We use human-like AI to process invoices more efficiently and accurately than any BPO can. Companies like Papaya trust Humanlike to process thousands of invoices per month.

founders.name: Andy Qin, Founder
founders.description: Andy was the 7th employee at Modern Treasury (YC S18), where he helped build and scale the Ledgers product to a 7-figure ARR line of business. Before that, he was an engineer at Stripe (YC S09) where he worked on the API developer experience and Stripe Atlas.

# Cut AP/AR costs by 80% with AI
Humanlike is a better alternative to outsourcing accounts payable and receivable. We use human-like AI to process invoices more efficiently and accurately than any BPO can. Built by fintech veterans from Stripe and Modern Treasury. Book a free process benchmarking consultation with us to review your current cashflow management processes today.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/1nq2slEDvbBGiMtZe8RgghWNKw.svg)
Risk-free Trial Period
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/1nq2slEDvbBGiMtZe8RgghWNKw.svg)
SOC 2 Compliant
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/A0GtmHbqtMJPuPWlPw4x3fwcPWA.png)
Using Humanlike is huge for us because it allows us to scale sub-linearly. If we double the number of transactions we process, it really helps to not have to double the size of our team.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/oJHpO58U9SXrTxdsjmCioPW0YiI.jpeg)
**Jeff Ho**
Head of Operations at Papaya

generated_description:
**Humanlike: Revolutionizing AP/AR with AI**

Founded in 2023 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S23, Humanlike is redefining how businesses approach accounts payable (AP) and accounts receivable (AR). Based on the principle of leveraging AI, Humanlike positions itself as a superior alternative to traditional outsourcing methods. It utilizes advanced human-like AI to process invoices with unmatched efficiency and accuracy, enabling companies to reduce operational costs significantly.

**Key Highlights:**

- **Mission:** To cut AP/AR costs by up to 80% through AI-powered solutions.
- **Who They Are:** Founded by fintech experts who previously worked at Stripe and Modern Treasury, Humanlike is currently serving clients like Papaya, processing thousands of invoices monthly.
- **Fun Fact:** Users experience a sub-linear scaling effect; doubling transaction volume doesn’t require a proportional increase in team size.

**What They Offer:**

1. **Cost Reduction:** Clients have reported average cost decreases of around 80%.
2. **24/7 Availability:** Humanlike ensures that invoice processing happens round-the-clock, without the limitations of human staffing.
3. **Quick Implementation:** The platform promises a speedy turnaround with an implementation time of approximately four weeks.
4. **Risk-Free Trial:** Interested parties can engage in a risk-free trial period, allowing them to evaluate human-like AI without upfront commitments.
5. **Compliance:** The company maintains SOC 2 compliance, assuring clients that their data handling meets high-security standards.

**Customer Testimonials:** 
Jeff Ho, Head of Operations at Papaya, lauds Humanlike, stating, “Using Humanlike is huge for us because it allows us to scale sub-linearly."

**In Conclusion:**
Humanlike isn’t just another startup; it’s a bold move into the future of financial operations. By pairing the expertise of seasoned fintech veterans with innovative AI solutions, it stands out in the crowded fintech landscape. Companies looking to enhance their cash flow management processes should certainly consider a consultation with Humanlike.

For more information, visit [Humanlike's website](https://humanlike.app/) or reach out directly at hello@humanlike.app.
